import React,{useState}from"react";import Preloader from"./components/Preloader";import Home from"./pages/Home";import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(true);const[activeTab,setActiveTab]=useState("Парфюмы");const handlePreloadFinish=()=>{console.log("Preloader finished");setIsLoading(false);};const getAudioForTab=tab=>{switch(tab){case"Парфюмы":return"/assets/work.mp3";case"О нас":return"/assets/about.mp3";case"Контакт":return"/assets/contact.mp3";default:return null;}};const audioSrc=getAudioForTab(activeTab);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:isLoading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Preloader,{onFinish:handlePreloadFinish}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{activeTab:activeTab,setActiveTab:setActiveTab,audioSrc:audioSrc})});};export default App;
